architecture.caption: Figure 1: Overview of MMed-RAG, a versatile factual multimodal RAG system designed to enhance the reliability of Med-LVLMs. It introduces a domain-aware retrieval mechanism that effectively handles different domains of medical images by selecting suitable retrieval models. Additionally, it uses an adaptive context selection approach to determine the optimal number of retrieved contexts and employs preference fine-tuning to improve both cross-modality and overall alignment.

results.caption: Table 18: Performance comparison based on different retrievers.
